DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect resveratrol health human performance . The study evaluate cognitive function several indicator physical health take resveratrol supplement placebo three week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Resveratrol Supplementation Measurements Health Human Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Measurements - blood laboratory parameter - cognitive assessment change - body composition change - vascular endothelial response
DOC.criteria: men woman 45 75 year age Normal heart rate Blood pressure Ability use personal computer interface Successful completion physical activity readiness questionnaire Cardiovascular disease , uncontrolled hypertension , lung disease inability tolerate exercise take grape related supplement past 12 month current use drug dietary supplement enhance exercise performance allergy wine , grape juice grape seed supplement
